Summary: A UFO THAT CHAGE OF COLORS TO YELLOW, RED AND BLUE IN ANCASH
trends: There have been no other sightings in ANCASH
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was traveling to Caraz localized in Ancash, . It was around midnight, i was in the bus, when suddenly i saw near the mountains an object that change of colors to yellow, red, and blue for about ten minutes making strange movements. Finally it dissapeared behind a mountain.
